Events 2023/2024

Posted on April 11, 2023

Here is a quick list of events in the next year or so that I found interesting. This list reflects my personal preferences, but I think it might be useful to others.

2023

June

  • Random walks in Bath

July

  • Saint-Flour Summer school
  • Stochastic Processes and their applications

September

  • Statistical Mechanics and Stochastic PDEs

December

  • Arbeitsgemeinschaft: QFT and Stochastic PDEs

2024

March-June

  • Geometry, Statistical Mechanics, and Integrability
